item.title: Adding files to Xcode projects from CLI
item.description: NOTE!: It’s now the year 2020 and I believe this technique no longer works in the latest versions of xcode. I have archived the github repo. I’ve left everything public so the information still exists. What follows is my original article from 2014… There have been times when building xcode projects from terminal has been very convenient, iâ€™ve also done it in a lot of scripts, however there is a drawback to this technique and I hope to solve it in this article.
